original_text: The Lord Almighty has already spoken about the valuable things that remain in this city. He has spoken about the two bronze pillars, the big bronze bath which is called “the Sea”, and the bronze carts to carry water.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 기둥들과 큰 대야와 받침들과 이 성에 남아 있는 기구에 대하여 이같이 말씀하시나니

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty has already spoken
about the valuable things that remain in this city
sentences.korean_translation: 이 도시에 남아있는 귀중한 것들에 대하여

sentences.original_text: He has spoken about the two bronze pillars
the big bronze bath which is called "the Sea"
and the bronze carts to carry water
